channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- 1st Gen AMD EPYC™
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- 1st Gen AMD EPYC™

item.title: CVE-2021-26331|2024-08-03T20:26:23.953Z -- amd -- 1st%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: AMD System Management Unit (SMU) contains a potential issue where a malicious user may be able to manipulate mailbox entries leading to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2021-26408|2024-08-03T20:26:25.323Z -- amd -- 1st%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: Insufficient validation of elliptic curve points in SEV-legacy firmware may compromise SEV-legacy guest migration potentially resulting in loss of guest's integrity or confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2021-26320|2024-08-03T20:19:20.338Z -- amd -- 1st%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: Insufficient validation of the AMD SEV Signing Key (ASK) in the SEND_START command in the SEV Firmware may allow a local authenticated attacker to perform a denial of service of the PSP

item.title: CVE-2021-26330|2024-08-03T20:26:23.947Z -- amd -- 1st%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: AMD System Management Unit (SMU) may experience a heap-based overflow which may result in a loss of resources.

item.title: CVE-2021-26321|2024-08-03T20:19:20.280Z -- amd -- 1st%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: Insufficient ID command validation in the SEV Firmware may allow a local authenticated attacker to perform a denial of service of the PSP.

item.title: CVE-2021-26322|2024-08-03T20:19:20.397Z -- amd -- 1st%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: Persistent platform private key may not be protected with a random IV leading to a potential “two time pad attack”.

item.title: CVE-2021-26329|2024-08-03T20:19:20.294Z -- amd -- 1st%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: AMD System Management Unit (SMU) may experience an integer overflow when an invalid length is provided which may result in a potential loss of resources.
